Lists with long elements are broken correctly
.
1. Urna nunc id cursus metus aliquam.  Sem viverra aliquet eget sit amet tellus cras adipiscing. A iaculis at erat.
1. Some.
1. Very.
1. Small.
1. Series.
.
1. Urna nunc id cursus metus aliquam.
